column4: Okay, let me refraise that sentence. I want my desktop to look real spiffy. Like Samurize (win32), maybe and integrated terminal on the background etc. ?
linux-source-2.6.10 must be in main. what's with the repositories?
I guess if he 'only' has the 2.4.27 repos, that he doesn't have the right ones. Prove me wrong?
